title: Amir Moulavi：澳大利亚地区将加入Realms！
author: kaho
txt_content:
@mamirm
We welcome Australia region to #Minecraft #Realms! Now 101 countries have Realms! :)
让我们欢迎澳大利亚地区加入 #Minecraft #Realms！现在Realms支持101个国家了 :)


至于天朝嘛...慢慢等吧
